title: The Team
itunes:title: The Team
itunes:subtitle: The Australian Army Training Team Vietnam
description:
Australia's longest running individual unit commitment was an advisory group working with the South Vietnamese forces against the North. Operating individually and in small groups, the advisors moved into an active combat role, leading the troops they had trained and in the process becoming the most decorated unit in the Vietnam War.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
